title: tricoteuse Table, Sewing, ca. 1870
medium: various woods, gilt bronze, green jasperware
description: Shallow rectangular box top with hinged long side; inlaid wood interior and exterior; exterior top also has alternating roundels of ormolu and Wedgwood plaques in ormolu frames; single support at each short side terminating in trestle foot; stretcher between supports has circular galleried receptacle holder. Ormolu trim throughout.

tombstone.epitaph: tricoteuse Table, Sewing, ca. 1870; France; various woods, gilt bronze, green jasperware; H x W x D: 81 x 59.5 x 37.5 cm (31 7/8 x 23 7/16 x 14 3/4 in.); 1952-165-2
